channel.title: Star Wars Saturdays Panel: Gauntlet Podcast
channel.description: On the new episode we present a GCOG panel hosted by @RichRogers with @Will_H and @Anders talking about dozens of *Star Wars* games run over the last four years as part of this series & how you hack existing games to the setting. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/episode-212-star-wars-saturdays-panel

item.title: Star Wars Saturdays Panel: Gauntlet Podcast
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the new episode we present a GCOG panel hosted by @RichRogers with @Will_H and @Anders talking about dozens of Star Wars games run over the last four years as part of this series & how you hack existing games to the setting.

THE GAUNTLET

Episode 212: Star Wars Saturdays Panel

iTunes:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/the-gauntlet-podcast/id951113347?mt=2 RSS:  http://gauntletpodcast.libsyn.com/rss

Read full topic
